comments: Michael is a snitch. I told him I reported our landlord and the inspector would follow up on all the violations in a few weeks, so he would have time to sort things out if anything happened. (by then my lease would be over and I would be long gone). Michael snitched the same day I told him. Michael is roughly 35 years old and still lives in somebody's backyard in North Berkeley. He often talks in a condescending way and can be quite uncomfortable to be around. Also, Michael had a girlfriend that looked quite young and I think she's an undergrad or something. This is quite creepy. And he has a seriously receded hairline lol. His website is at: https://mrowan137.dev/ and his linkedin is: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michael-rowan-b16bb0149.
